review: I bought this and then realized what I wanted was available without this. Oh well, I gave it to mom! Makes for an excellent present. Oh and I want to point out - this thing eats Google Chrome alive. Chrome rely's on your mobile device or laptop, which is all wifi related. The FireTV Stick has a nifty little controller that is super sensitive to the touch and works from half way across the house. It also has availability of a universal controller on your phone, for those people stuck in the Google Chrome era. It's just a better product and I'd recommend it.And as others have said, it's just even more useful when you have Prime.
